tool_description: The crux behind the API is to provide key URLs from the top newspapers  and sources around the world about the topics wrt Mental health and wellbeing
title: mental-health-info-api

api_list.name: Specific Source Information
api_list.description: This endpoint helps to fetch information wrt a particular source wrt mental health and wellbeing.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mental-health-info-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mental-health-info-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: General Information
api_list.description: This endpoint helps to get all the information in one go via all the focused sources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mental-health-info-api.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mental-health-info-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
